ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Digital Ionogram Database Repository at UML

RevisionEvent.Note:
Moved to ISWI Naming Authority. Updated Resource ID,
InformationURL and AccessURL, updated PriorID and SPASE version. LNG

ResourceHeader.Description:
The DIDBase repository at University of Massachusetts Lowell is a
relational database holding raw ionogram data and ionogram-derived ionospheric
characteristics for the Global Ionospheric Radio Observatory (GIRO). Public
access to the DIDBase resource is arranged via SAO Explorer software available
at http://umlcar.uml.edu/SAO-X/ and web access portal https://giro.uml.edu/didbase/
